sentences.sContent: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
The weather was a lot worse this year.
Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.sCn: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.sContent: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.sCn: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.sContent: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.sCn: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.sContent: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.sCn: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.sContent: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.sCn: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.sContent: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.sCn: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

words.tran: 恶化（worsen的ing形式）；使变得更坏
